arts.ttl: Mainz secure crucial 2-0 victory over Stuttgart to stay in top six
arts.sum: In the 29th minute, Paul Nebel found Weiper with a well-timed pass, and the young striker coolly slotted past Alexander Nübel to give Mainz the lead. Nadiem Amiri was named player of the match for his influential performance in midfield.
Sky Germany reports that Juventus Turin are currently targeting VfB Stuttgart centre-back Jeff Chabot.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart defender linked with Juventus move
arts.sum: Jeff Chabot has reportedly attracted interest from Juventus.

Mainz have all week to prepare, while Stuttgart must recover from their Champions League trip to Bratislava in midweek. Stuttgart, runners-up last term, sit in fourth after an impressive run of form ...

arts.ttl: Mainz vs Stuttgart preview: Huge Test of European Credentials
arts.sum: In a clash featuring two sides at the top end of the Bundesliga, in-form Stuttgart travel to face a Mainz side winless in two.

arts.ttl: Do VfB Stuttgart boast the best collection of strikers in the Bundesliga right now?
arts.sum: In Deniz Undav, Ermedin Demirović and Nick Woltemade, Stuttgart boast a trio of attacking stars that would walk into almost any team in Germany on current form. No other Bundesliga club can boast three strikers with at least six league goals each this season, underlining the impact they're having.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. Stuttgart - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and Stuttgart, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
